sources.title: Corregidor
sources.description: A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

sources.title: Corregidor
sources.description: Title: Corregidor Summary: A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack. Directed by: William Nigh Actors: Otto Kruger, Elissa Landi, Donald Woods Production Company: Atlantis Pictures Release Date: 29 March 1943 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

sources.title: Corregidor (1943) ACTION
sources.description:
Stars: Otto Kruger, Elissa Landi, Donald Woods
 Director: William Nigh
 Writers: Edgar G. Ulmer

 A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

sources.title: Corregidor (1943) Drama, War Full Length Movie
sources.description:
28 days of epic heroism - that shook the world! A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

Director: William Nigh
Writers: Doris Malloy, Edgar G. Ulmer
Stars: Otto Kruger, Elissa Landi, Donald Woods 
Genres: Classics, Drama , War
